org.vaniglia.log4j
Class RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      org.apache.log4j.WriterAppender
          org.apache.log4j.FileAppender
              org.vaniglia.log4j.RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler
public class RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.FileAppender

This is a log4j appender that rolls the file daily and also based on the file dimention. ---> A example of properties configuration for this logger is the following: log4j.appender.LogFile=org.vaniglia.log4j.RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender log4j.appender.LogFile.FileName=LogFile.log log4j.appender.LogFile.rootFolder=logs log4j.appender.LogFile.DateFolderPattern=yyyy-MM-dd log4j.appender.LogFile.MaxFileSize=1MB log4j.appender.LogFile.MaxBackupIndex=10 log4j.appender.LogFile.updatePeriodMS=1000 ---> Default values log4j.appender.LogFile.FileName=file.log log4j.appender.LogFile.rootFolder=logs log4j.appender.LogFile.DateFolderPattern=yyyy-MM-dd log4j.appender.LogFile.MaxFileSize=10MB log4j.appender.LogFile.MaxBackupIndex=1 log4j.appender.LogFile.updatePeriodMS=1000

Constructor Detail

RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender

public RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender()
The default constructor does no longer set a default layout nor a default output target. This is required as the appender class is dynamically loaded.

RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender

public RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender(org.apache.log4j.Layout layout,
                                        java.lang.String filename,
                                        boolean append)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Instantiate a RollingFileAppender and open the file designated by filename. The opened filename will become the ouput destination for this appender.

If the append parameter is true, the file will be appended to. Otherwise, the file desginated by filename will be truncated before being opened.

RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender

public RollingFileFoldersBackupAppender(org.apache.log4j.Layout layout,
                                        java.lang.String filename)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Instantiate a FileAppender and open the file designated by filename. The opened filename will become the output destination for this appender.

The file will be appended to.
